title: Put Your Money Where Your Mouth Is
resume: Put Your Money Where Your Mouth Is is a BBC television series that was first shown on BBC One from 10 March 2008 to 18 June 2010, then shown on BBC Two from 14 February 2011 to 13 May 2012 where it aired its Food spin-off from 5 May 2009 to 5 June 2009 and then shown back on BBC One since 18 February 2013 where it also aired its Chefs spin-off from 8 April 2013 to 26 April 2013.
